name: Dice, dice baby!
description:
A short shoot-em-up game made for GMTK Game Jam 2022.

Before every round dices will roll and determine the rules of the round. It the given - very short - time I was able to fully implement shooting mechanics with different weapon/ammo/effect types, two enemy types (meele and ranged)

The rules rolled by dices are as follows:

- Available weapon

- Wave duration

- Number of waves

- And amount of enemies in each wave

Let the dices decided your fate... And survive!
